attributes.action: stop the discrimination against rainbow sheep.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bah bah rainbow sheep,
Have you any wool?
Yes Sir, yes Sir,
Three bags full.

It's not quite the same as what we were used to when we were younger. It is ridiculous that the Political Correctness of this country has reached these heights, and it's about time that people took a step back and realized that black sheep are not insighting racial hatred; our children's minds are not being warped by nursery rhymes, and it is not offensive to anybody to use the word 'black' in an 'every-day' context.
